TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Thickness extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.Windows.Thickness>
Public Structure Thickness Implements IEquatable(Of Thickness)

span.span: Describes the thickness of a frame around a rectangle.

summary.span: 四个 值分别描述矩形的 、、 和 边。

span.span: Four values describe the , , , and sides of the rectangle, respectively.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过两种方式指定值。You can specify values in two ways. 如果将四个值传递给结构, 则它们分别表示边框的 、 和边。If you pass four values to the structure, they represent the , , and sides, respectively, of the bounding rectangle. 您还可以提供单个值, 将统一值应用于边框的四个边。You can also supply a single value, which applies a uniform value to all four sides of the bounding rectangle. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```xaml ``` 或-or- ```xaml ``` 或-or- ```xaml ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *left**left* 框架的左边缘, 描述为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]指定度量值的值, 或为*qualifiedDouble* (请参阅下文)。The left edge of the frame, described as either a value that specifies a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] measure, or as a *qualifiedDouble* (see below). 如果只指定了一个度量值, 则该度量值将应用于的所有左、上、右、下值。If only a single measure is specified, that measure is applied to ALL of the left,top,right,bottom values of a . 如果只指定了一对左、上个度量值, 则这些度量值将对称应用于: 向右使用左值; 顶部值用于底部。If only a pair of left,top measures are specified, these measures are applied symmetrically to a : the left value is used for right; the top value is used for bottom. *top**top* 框架的上边缘, 描述为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]指定度量值的值, 或为*qualifiedDouble* (请参阅下文)。The top edge of the frame, described as either a value that specifies a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] measure, or as a *qualifiedDouble* (see below). 如果只指定了一对左、上个度量值, 则这些度量值将对称应用于: 向右使用左值; 顶部值用于底部。If only a pair of left,top measures are specified, these measures are applied symmetrically to a : the left value is used for right; the top value is used for bottom. *right**right* 框架的右边缘, 描述为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]指定度量值的值, 或为*qualifiedDouble* (请参阅下文)。The right edge of the frame, described as either a value that specifies a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] measure, or as a *qualifiedDouble* (see below). 如果未指定, 将使用左边的值。If left unspecified, will use the left value. *bottom**bottom* 框架的下边缘, 描述为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]指定度量值的值, 或为*qualifiedDouble* (请参阅下文)。The bottom edge of the frame, described as either a value that specifies a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] measure, or as a *qualifiedDouble* (see below). 如果未指定, 将使用左边的值。If left unspecified, will use the left value. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* 上述任何度量值的*双精度*值, 后跟以下单元声明字符串之一`px`:、 `in`、 `cm`和`pt`。A *double* value as described above for any of the measures, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px`(默认值) 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in`为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm`为厘米;1cm = = (96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt`为点;1pt = = (96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px > [!NOTE] > 指定为字符串时, 值不需要显式包含小数点。Values need not include the decimal point explicitly when specified as a string. 当在代码中引用时, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]在中提供的字符串 "1" 的计算结果为1.0 的值。The string "1" provided in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] evaluates to a value of 1.0 when referenced in code. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]和代码创建结构的实例并设置其属性。The following example shows how to create an instance of a structure and set its properties by using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code. [!code-csharp[ThicknessStruct#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThicknessStruct/CSharp/ThicknessSamp.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ThicknessStruct#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThicknessStruct/VisualBasic/ThicknessSampVB.vb#2)] [!code-xaml[ThicknessStruct#2](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ThicknessStruct/XAML/default.xaml#2)]
